kpi.name: sgsn_363a
kpi.formula: (plmn.successful_intra_sgsn_rau + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_3 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_6 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_7 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_8 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_9 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_10 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_11 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_12 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_13 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_14 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_15 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_22 + plmn.fail_intra_sgsn_rau_prot)

kpi_info.title: Intra SGSN RAU attempts, PLMN id
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of intra SGSN RAU (GPRS + combined) attempts per PLMN id on Gb or Iu interface.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(SUCCESSFUL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_3 + FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_6 +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_7 + FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_8 +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_9 + FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_10 +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_11 + FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_12 +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_13 + FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_14 +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_15 + FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_22 +
FAIL_INTRA_SGSN_RAU_PROT)

counters from table(s): p_sgsn_plmn

kpi.kpi_alias: Intra SGSN RAU attempts, PLMN id
